reviews.sentence: Amazing Location Hotel and Customer Service. I had such a great experience at the Hilton in Memphis. The hotel is amazing in itself but what really set this experience apart was the top notch service afforded me by Wiliam. As soon as I walked in he greeted me warmly inquired where I was from and if this was my first visit to Memphis which it was and proceeded to give me some great information about the area. I travel a lot for my job and very rarely do I experience such a high level of customer service. This will be my go to Hotel for ally my future visits to Memphis.

Great hotel experience. The hotel was very nice. Our room was very clean and had a beautiful view on the 17th floor. Everyone was very friendly that worked there and very helpful. The pool and hot tub was very clean and my daughter loved it. We will for sure stay here again next time we come to Memphis.

Hilton Memphis shines like Gold. Our Family was traveling together after a family tragedy and several members were flying out of Memphis so we booked this hotel near the airport not far from Graceland. This circular glass hotel has all the full service amenities including a year round outdoor pool and spa no charge ample parking restaurant etc. but it has the best staff Gail Hopkins the night manager gave us the best upgrade we have ever hadCandy Franklin the night concierge was so friendly and hospitable she made our night in the executive lounge. This morning at breakfast our day was blessed by the service of Mary Salvoid. We stay in a lot of hotels but I have to say these three ladies really made it an exceptional experience. As did a few other employees I did not get their names the Front Desk Assistant Manager who I forgot her name but she sure remembered mine. The delightful doorman with a sunny smile and disposition I would definitely recommend this hotel for any one staying in or near Memphis.

Best Hotel Experience. This was by far the best Hilton experience ever. Everything from the rooms to the employees was excellent. I even drive further to get to my destination in order to stay there. Great service and warmth from staff made it amazing. Also the fitness room is the best hotel fitness room I have ever experienced.

Great Service. We had a good experience at this hotel while attending a very large conference. The staff was very courteous in dealing with all our needs and the deli staff were so friendly with everyone they came in contact with.

Wonderful introduction to Memphis. My stay here was one unexpected pleasant experience. The pictures does not do justice for this place in person. The architecture is very modern contemporary with amenities and nice sized commercial area nearby so the option for being indoors or outdoors was fun. The breakfast buffet was set in a great location so that it feels as you are having breakfast on a pond. The staff was very friendly especially J at front reception who treated my mother and myself with the icing on the cake for our arrival and departure she is really awesome and helped us get a feel of how lovely it is to enjoy memphis. We even extended our stay and was nt ready to leave still Great place to begin a vacation.

The peace serenity scenery and the surroundings. My church was holding service in one of the convention center rooms and with me driving 4 hours was a great help. After I checked out I sent for my van valetand the battery was dead. I did not inform the valet about the auto crank on my van and had to get a boost as he threw the auto crank system somehow and had to spend 50 to get reprogramed.

Great Hotel. My experience at the Hilton Memphis was phenomenal from the planning process to check out. I dare not mention names because I am sure I will forget someone. I will say this upper management is to be commended because it starts at the top. You all have a staff of people that not just come to work for a check but are passionate about being of service a rare commodity.
Excellent facility staff that are friendly and very helpful. Southern hospitality. Clean nice room. Good location in the city. Overall an excellent experience.

CONSITENTLY A VERY COMFORTABLE HOTEL EXPERIENCE. I come to Memphis about once per month for about a week. MEMPHIS HILTON is my first choice. Love the location. It has everything I need internet computers and printers in the lobby a Starbucks open till 11. PM an Executive Lounge with complementary food and drinks. Easy parking. Consistently a very comfortable hotel experience.
Great hotel. Bathroom was tiny but overall an excellent experience. Would recommend very highly and I would stay here again.

Much better experience at other Hilton hotels. This was the first time staying at the Memphis Hilton and my overall experience was less than satisfactory mainly due to outside construction noice the hot tub was cold some of the elevators were down extremely cold conference rooms no refrigerators in the rooms and I was double billed.

Poor representation of the Hilton brand. Escalators hot tub room television were all out of order rude desk staff rooms not ready 2 hours after check in time no executive lounge even though you pay for it. the list of poor experience is extensive. I would not recommend this Hilton location. The only friendly helpful staff were the bellman.

Class Conference. The Staff were very helpful and available. I stayed at the hotel for a class conference and the escalator was broken but other than that tiny setback it was an overall great experience. I would stay there again.

Bad experience with getting sinuses. Bed was lumpy and hard and no water pressure front desk person needs help not a hotel for the money. This hotel needs to be updated especially the rooms to even be close to the star rating it is showing.

How about not lying on your site. The room we book was not what we where given. We over paid for a room that did nt even exist. You basically ruined my wedding. I will not ever recommend booking hotels on your site. I want my money back. I honestly can not believe that I trusted Expedia to book our wedding hotel and when i called to ask why i m not getting what i paid for i was transferred to a lot of different people who did nt know what to do. AND the hotel was under construction. Then to top it all of our room was dirty with mold and with no toilet paper. I wish someone would actually contact me to talk but no one knows what they are doing on Expedia. I believe that I will be doing a review of my hotel booking experience soon. Expedia ruined our wedding holiday. Anyone who reads this you have been warned. The hotel staff has told us that this happens all the time. Do nt trust Expedia anymore.

dissatisfaction pile up visiting memphis for a family wedding at hilton we thought it would be great because of previous experience with hilton boy were we wrong we paid 132 night arrived to find out the two room we got where in the basement we did not like that but before we expressed our anger we found out the heater is not working and it was freezing that night. and also we have a 6 months baby with us sat for a minute to digest that i tried to turn the tv on but to add salt to injury tv was not working i could not take all that at once and from hilton so i went back up to the front desk and i expressed my dissatisfaction with all these issues to my suprise the front desk said they have no other rooms to switch us to i said ok can fix the heater the lady said no one here i asked for the manager they said they will be here in the morning i asked what do we do now. they called one guy who could not fix the tv because of a missing cable he said and he brought us a small heater for the night until the next morning when the morning supervisor moved us to 2 other rooms not to mention after a long drive from oklahoma city to memphis we expected some service with the belonging when we arrived which was not available and no carts to make the move any easier it a struggle to stay there for the 2 nights when we thought after driving 10 hours with kids staying at the hilton would be the relief and the relaxing part we difenetly wrer wrong.

Horrible Customer Service. Horrible customer service. I was told I would be reimbursed for taking a taxi after calling three times to be picked at the airport by their free shuttle service. Each time I was told the shuttle was on the way. I stood right next to pole 16 underneath the hotel shuttle sign where they told me to stand. I waited there for 55 minutes before calling to inform them that I would be taking a taxi which I was told the taxi driver would be reimbursed for. He was not. Jasmine the front desk associate explained to me over the phone that they would reimburse my taxi driver if he simply came in to the front desk with the receipt. When I arrived I was then told in person by the same person Jasmine that he would be reimbursed. When he came in with the receipt suddenly it was decided that they could not reimburse him and they would have to reimburse me. Which was fine with me BUT then after telling me that they would reimburse me all of sudden they could not or they could only put it to the room or if I wanted to buy room service. I explained to them that I was here for work and that my company had already paid for the room. Also that I was missing the dinner I was supposed to attend that evening because I waited to be picked up at the airport for 55 minutes and because I was standing there speaking to them about this issue that is still unresolved. They said their hands were tied at that point. I have worked in customer service and this was by far some of the worst customer service I have ever experienced. You do not tell someone that the shuttle is on its way when it clearly is not or you explain to that guest that the shuttle just left the airport and it will probably take another 30 45 minutes for another one to arrive. In that case I could have decided then to take a taxi and not wait 55 minutes. ALSO you DO NOT tell someone you can reimburse them over the phone and in person and then DO NOTHING.

Great property Great Service Great Experience. Often I can be critical of a hotel stay if the experience has been poor. the stay here in Memphis at the Hilton was the exact opposite it was amazing. The hotel itself is in Germantown which is about 25 minutes from downtown and in a great area. Lots of restaurant choices and shopping. Upon check in Service was great. It was friendly fast efficient and we were greeted as Honors members. We had a room on the executive floor and although an older Hilton property the room itself was very clean. Friday night we went down to Beale Street and upon our return and to our surprise was a cheese tray bucket of cold waters and a personal note thanking us for being guests of the hotel. A first class move. Breakfast was very good and again exceptional service. Highly recommend the Hilton Memphis every time. Stay here easy Uber ride to downtown and a great property. Tim ToepferNashvile TN.

Very noisy through the night. Please read review for explanation. Clean room. Knocking noise all through the night Approximately evey half hour. Each time my wife and I got up there was no one at the door. Each time there were three knocks. Could have been heating system. Reported with no change. Called management next day Art. Apologised and said half payment would be reimbursed within 24 hours. No reimbursement received within 24 hours. Called accounting Daniel. Apologised and payment would arrive within 3 5 days. Finally received 4 days later. This was not about payment but to investigate and improve experience for future customers. Hope this is a helpful review and hope to use The Hilton which usually has a good reputation in the future. Thank you for your cooperation. Respectfully Richard Keith room 2307.
